original_text: He offered sacrifices in Ben-Hinnom Valley. He even caused his sons to walk through fire. In this way he copied the terrible sins of the other nations in Canaan. Those were the nations that the Lord had chased out so that the Israelites could live there.
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들 골짜기에서 분향하고 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람들의 가증한 일을 본받아 그의 자녀들을 불사르고

sentences.original_text: He offered sacrifices in Ben-Hinnom Valley.
He even caused his sons to walk through fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 심지어 자기 아들들을 불 속으로 걷게 했다.

sentences.original_text: In this way he copied the terrible sins of the other nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 방식으로 그는 다른 민족들의 끔찍한 죄를 본떴다.

sentences.original_text: Those were the nations that the Lord had chased out.
so that the Israelites could live there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 백성이 그곳에서 살 수 있도록.
